dialogues.text:
That... was too much...
What the hell is that sound?
Why can't I see anything?!

Incomplete biometric factor analysis.
Please try to keep the beings alive long enough to
complete the analysis.

I understand. No, thanks.
What should I do now?!

Anomalous movement detected... It matches the 
ocation of the eggs registered in the previous zone.
This could be a sign of hatching.

Recommend evacuating the area immediately.
Head to the tunnel. Run!
